title: The War for North America
description: In the 1700s, France and Great Britain were looking to expand their empires into North America, striving for global power. The War for North America details the events of the French and Indian War and what eventually led the British empire to triumph. This historical account will give students a look into North America's past, as well as allow students the opportunity to ask and answer questions while they read and identify cause-and-effect relationships in a nonfiction text.
